place:
(:action place_ingredients
    :parameters (?flour - whole_wheat ?bowl - mixing_bowl ?salt - ingredient)
    :precondition (and (at ?flour ?bowl) (at ?salt ?bowl) (not (ingredients_placed ?bowl)))
    :effect (ingredients_placed ?bowl)
)

(:action place_pastry_on_sheet
    :parameters (?pastry - pastry ?sheet - sheet)
    :precondition (and (at ?pastry ?sheet) (not (pastry_on_sheet ?pastry)))
    :effect (pastry_on_sheet ?pastry)
)

(:action pour_ingredients_into_oil
    :parameters (?user - user ?bottle - bottle ?oil - oil ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (has ?user ?bottle) (contains ?bottle ?oil) (at ?user ?container) (not (oil_poured ?container)))
    :effect (oil_poured ?container)
)
create:
(:action create_edge
    :parameters (?oil - canola_oil ?table - table ?fork - utensil)
    :precondition (and (at ?oil ?table) (has ?fork ?user) (not (edge_created ?pastry)))
    :effect (edge_created ?pastry)
)
```

These PDDL actions capture the steps and the logic required to make whole wheat pastry with canola oil, based on the provided descriptions.
